QE.Title: Quick Encounters
QE.Description: Pin your Encounters to the Scene or in the Journal and run them with one click!
QE.CONTENT.AddADescription: Add a description of the quick encounter for you or your players:
QE.CONTENT.Instructions: When you close this Journal Entry, the selected tokens will be replaced with a single Encounter icon on the scene. When you want to run the Quick Encounter, double-click the skull icon and then press the Add to Combat Tracker button.
QE.BUTTON.AddToCombatTracker: Add Quick Encounter to Combat Tracker
QE.BUTTON.CreateEncounterJournal: Save tokens to Quick Encounter Journal
QE.ERROR.SelectTokens: Please place and select tokens before using the Quick Encounters button
